channel.title: Removing/Adding commands
channel.description:
Anyone know how to do it? Cause theres commands in my source I really dont like and I delete the whole command from client.java and it still works... Anyone know how to fix this?
Also It doesn't work when I add commands.

item.title: Removing/Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @mythicfire mythicfire
item.description:
@mythicfire wrote:

I don’t care that much about noclip, it’s just the fact that i can’t get rid of or add and commands at all in my server[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 07:18:00 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 08:54:09 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 10:49:04 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 06:04:39 PM[/size][hr],

Read full topic

item.title: Removing/Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

If you want to get rid of noclip, try this…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip"))
	{
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " just tried to noclip!");
	disconnected = true;
	}

If you noclip, it tells everyone your a noob and tried to noclip, and logs you out…

If you cant get javac working, then you cant host a server.

Try following directions, not just leeching.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing/Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @mythicfire mythicfire
item.description:
@mythicfire wrote:

Still doesn’t work. I’m trying top get rid of noclip. I got rid if it from client.java and compiled, yet it still works.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing/Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

Okay then. Right click your compile.bat (compiler) and replace all of what is there with:

@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Then in your runserver.bat (runserver), right click, edit, replace all code with this:

@echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Hope it helps

Read full topic
